title: The problem with LeaverBuster
body: You need to fix your leave system because I don't see how it's fair that we can't have anything done about being put in a low priority queue even if it's a real-life emergency, like WTF why can't you do anything about it it's YOUR game and YOUR system why must you insist that we players even when we have a real life problem at hand that all activity of our account is our responsibility we could just have had someone/thing die and been put in a lower priority queue even if it's a bot game because we had more important things to do than finish a GAME of League so then we can go and do what we have to do, further more I don't see how it's our fault that YOUR servers are lagging us so bad our games crash this is in no way fair and I want something done about it.

replies.body:
Hey there,

The leaverbuster system in it's current state is not flawed as far as I can tell. Riot understands that occasionally real life issues may come up that will interfere with a game, especially if its an emergency.

The system is set up in such a way that you don't get punished for simply leaving one game, it takes a few games for punishment to be given (ranked is treated more serious, however I do believe that one game won't get you punished)

For more information on leaverbuster please see the [Leaverbuster FAQ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752714-LeaverBuster-FAQ).


> **IT'S NOT MY FAULT. MY INTERNET/YOUR SERVERS DISCONNECTED ME. I HAD A REAL-LIFE EMERGENCY. I HAD TO GET OFF THE COMPUTER. THE GAME CRASHED. UNBAN ME!**
> We understand that players may be forced to leave from time to time so the system has been designed to keep these situations in mind. After leaving a few games, you will be placed into a low priority queue; as long as you can complete 5 matchmade games without leaving, you will be returned to the normal queue. However, if you continue to leave games, you will remain in the low priority queue.
